name: Meditation
description: Until you play an attack card, you heal 5 HP per turn, gain first-turn priority, and receive 25% less damage.

hooks.OnTurnStart: Player.CurrentHP += 5; Player.HasPriority = true; Log(PlayerDisplayName + " heals 5 HP through meditation!");
hooks.OnTakeDamage: int reduced = (int)(IncomingDamage * 0.25); IncomingDamage -= reduced; Log("Meditation reduces damage by " + reduced + "!");
hooks.OnPlay: if (Card != null && Card.Type.ToString() == "Attack") { RemoveStatus(); Log(PlayerDisplayName + " breaks from meditation!"); }
